Coding Steve's Blog

RSS Feed

I'm a senior software developer with about 9 years of experience doing devops and development work. This is my blog where I write posts I wish I had found online myself.

I also write on my substack, which is a little less technical and sometimes a bit more personal. You can find that at https://substack.com/@stevenpg1
